item.description:
This initial meeting is expected to run about 30-45 minutes.

The agenda will include:
1. Attendance sign-in and member introductions.
2. General discussion of purpose and expectations.
3. Suggestion period - possible locations for future meetings, topics of interest for review and discussion, potential speakers, educational issues, other ideas, etc.
4. Make tentative arrangements for our next meeting based upon input from those members in attendance.
5. Have a group photo taken.
6. Adjourn.

group.name: The Charlestown Investor's Business Daily Forum

item.name: The Charlestown Investor's Business Daily Forum August Meetup
